text: "The Sign" is a hit song performed by Ace of Base. It was released as a single on 29 October 1993 in Europe. The song hit #2 on the UK Singles Chart. It spent six weeks near #1 in the United States. A cover version of this song was played on the television series Full House. Another version of this song lasts six minutes and 49 seconds. Category:1993 songs Category:Pop songs
title: The Sign
